name: Island, racer - Intro to Game Engine wk1
name_original: Island, racer - Intro to Game Engine wk1
description:
Ride around the island track! Watch out for .... Don't fall into the sea?

Control instructions:

Use W/S to control the vehicle forward/backward

A/D to control the direction of the vehicle

The game has no sound.

---

This is the assignment for 2022 fall - Intro to Game Engine wk1.

I aim to master the game maker studio's tile set feature with this project.

In addition, this is an experimental project in which I tried more realistic tire marks, water fall effects for the vehicle and some other things new.

  • Tileset: Assigned tileset for assignment provide by Adam Saltsman
  • Text font - Kenney Mini Square
